subdisciplines.name: Air Pollution Control Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study and design of systems and technologies to regulate and reduce pollutants emitted into the air.

subdisciplines.name: Water and Wastewater Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The design and implementation of systems to manage water resources, prevent water pollution and treat wastewater.

subdisciplines.name: Solid and Hazardous Waste Management
subdisciplines.description: The study and management of the collection, transport, disposal, and recycling of solid and hazardous wastes.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical behavior of pollutants in the environment and the development of methods to prevent and remediate pollution.
